arm_(ARM)_locking_piece_handle.name: Arm (SAME[ARM]) Locking Piece Handle is Loose or Damaged
solutions: If the arm locking piece handle is loose, then tighten it up.
If the arm locking piece handle is damaged, then replace it

something_loose.name: Some Arm, Motor or Propeller is Loose
solutions: Suspend operations immediately and contact technical support.
